name: FPV Air Tracks
description: Customizable realistic racing quadcopter simulator: Push your FPV racing to the next level or develop real life drone flight skills for the first time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 770 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4000 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I'm not to sure on this. Flight doesn't feel real to me even after messing with weight/expo/drag/blah blah. Using a taranis. I'v been flying fpv for 2 years. Sound is terrible. A few of the maps if you fly fast enough you can fly through objects. I'm sorry but it just doesn't feel right at all to me. I'm going to keep the game though and hope that it is fixed in the future. I bought this for practicing new moves and such.
need easy traing mode it hard to control for first timers still need improvement and need full control for xbox 360pc controller.

What a waste of money, doesn't work with one of the most common radios (DX5e) and the mouse and keyboard controls just don't work. Please do not let the good graphics fool you because inside the game is broken.
Now i love drones i own a few my self this game is a bag of crap steam refund here i come
